item.title: My first basic calculator
item.dc:creator: @NewFagg NewFagg
item.description:
@NewFagg wrote:

I made this basic calculator with the help of Eclipse. This is my first project ever(:

import java.util.Scanner;

class ninja{
public static void main(String Args[]){
Scanner azn = new Scanner(System.in);
double fnum, snum, answer;
System.out.println("Enter yo first number dawg: ");
fnum = azn.nextDouble();
System.out.println("Enter yo second number dawg: ");
snum = azn.nextDouble();
answer = fnum + snum;
System.out.println(answer);
}
}
